mainPalette.title: Main Palette
mainPalette.text: Simple, yet effective. Classic yet modern. No need to get crazy, just colors that work.

accentPalette.title: Accent Palette
accentPalette.text: The color palette should compliment not compete. So in the essence of being as basic as I can be I introduce the most uncommon colors out there... Yellow, Green, Blue, and Red.

typeface.title: Typeface
typeface.text: Open-source, variable and classic. Plus can't beat that name.
